DialoguePiece.message: Manequin: ...... (the manequin looks at you expectingly a knife stuck to it's head)
responses: [1] You: Hey there you seem pretty uh... cottony.
[2] You: Ew... this manequin smells like garbage.
[3] *take the knife out of its head*

branches.message: Manequin: ..... (the manequin seems happy about your cottony talk)
responses: [1] You: Oh so you are a fan of cotton? Yeah I really love to um use it to make stuffed animals.
[2] You: yeah I'm sorry this is kind of boring.'

branches.message: Manequin: ..... (the manequin enjoys the talk but can tell you don't have much to say on the topic)'
responses: You: yeah that's pretty much all I know on the subject.'

branches.message: Manequin: ..... (the manequin respects your honesty and leaves no longer interested)'
responses: You: Well that went just as well as I expected.'

branches.message: Manequin: ..... (Deeply offended the manequin storms out)'
responses: You: That.... could have gone better.'

branches.message: Manequin: ..... (deeply offended and saddened by your comment the manequin leaves keeping its distance from you)'
responses: You: I could have done that better.'

branches.message: Manequin: ..... (the manequin eyes the knife in your hand sadly)'
responses: You: Oh shoot you wanted that in your head didn't you'

branches.message: *You put it back into the manequin's head it looks to have calmed down*'
responses: [1] You: Well not gonna do that again... um uhhhhhh *you can't think of anything to say*.'
[2] You: Well I feel like this is just awkward so I'll see myself out.'

branches.message: Manequin: ..... (the manequin awaits something from you)'
responses: You: Um are you a fan of Anime?

branches.message: Manequin: ..... (the manequin is overjoyed by the mere mention of anime and proceeds to talk you to death about it)'
responses: *overjoyed about making the manequin happy you consider this a win*'

branches.message: *You leave the manequin alone dissapointed by how bad you fumbled the interaction*'
responses: You: Man if I failed that badly when talking to an inanimate object how will I even surive talking to a real person?'
